title: Novoiushino
data: Novoiushino (Russian: Новоиушино) is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Novoiushinsky Selsoviet of Togulsky District, Altai Krai, Russia. The population was 357 in 2016.[2] There are 12 streets. Novoiushino is located 23 km north of Togul (the district's administrative centre) by road. Novokhmelyovka is the nearest rural locality.[3] This Togulsky District location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
